subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Butler, the N.C.A.A. tournament runner-up in 2010 and 2011, is leaving the Horizon League and joining the Atlantic 10 beginning with the 2013-14 season.
snippet: Butler, the N.C.A.A. tournament runner-up in 2010 and 2011, is leaving the Horizon League and joining the Atlantic 10 beginning with the 2013-14 season.
